title: Human Consciousness - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/18/21
itunes:title: Human Consciousness - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/18/21
description:
George Noory and author Robert Davis explore his research into human consciousness, whether consciousness is a part of the physical human brain or something external, and how he believes consciousness could allow us to experience alternate realities or survive near death experiences.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

George Noory and author Robert Davis explore his research into human consciousness, whether consciousness is a part of the physical human brain or something external, and how he believes consciousness could allow us to experience alternate realities or survive near death experiences.

itunes:summary: An examination into the connection that bonds humans to the universe.
